english.segment1: My pet, my pet-how fun you are. I trust you so much I even leave the cage door ajar. you'd never harm me, but just to be safe-I admire you from afar
english.segment2: The coiling is fast. this time it's your last. your soul asphyxiated. final chance for escape terminated
english.segment4: So harmless-me the master-you the slave. I reach out to touch you-I'm getting so brave. You affect me but little-I still haven't changed. and to those who find me abrasive-it's you that's deranged
english.segment5: The coiling is fast. this time it's your last. your soul asphyxiated. final chance for escape terminated
english.segment8: Enveloped in python. constriction complete. where dreams become nightmares. of total defeat
english.segment9: Not just a white line or addiction of some kind. but entanglement with anger or to bitterness bind
